value.title: Introduction to Content Moderator
value.excerpt: Discover how Content Moderator can evaluate text, images, and video, for appropriateness.

value.title: Introduction to Form Recognizer
value.excerpt: Form Recognizer provides your software with automated data identification and extraction from your documents. Using an SDK or REST, the AI-powered service decreases, or can completely eliminate, time spent on and errors in data entry, while also making it easier to utilize your data.

value.title: Build an AI web app by using Python and Flask
value.excerpt: Use Python, Flask, and Azure Cognitive Services to build a web app that incorporates AI

value.title: Identify guiding principles for responsible AI
value.excerpt: Explore six principles to guide AI development and use - fairness, reliability and safety, privacy and security, inclusiveness, transparency, and accountability

value.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
value.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

value.title: Translate speech with the speech service
value.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Use Language Understanding with Speech
value.excerpt: Use Language Understanding with Speech

value.title: How to get started with Azure Machine Learning Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with the Azure Machine Learning Service and how you can use it from Visual Studio Code.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit.  Create your free account

value.title: Evaluate text with Azure Cognitive Language Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Cognitive Language Services to analyze text, determine intent, detect adult themes, and process natural language input

topItems.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

topItems.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

topItems.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the Text Analytics API and Azure Functions to discover what your customers are really saying in their feedback about your products or brands.

value.title: Understand the importance of building an AI-ready culture
value.excerpt: Understand the key elements that make a culture AI-ready and a framework to drive the change needed in your organization for a successful AI strategy.

value.title: Track wild polar bears with AI
value.excerpt: Detect and track polar bears through photos using AI, then use Power BI to show where polar bears are being spotted.

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model

value.title: Create a Language Understanding app
value.excerpt: Create a Language Understanding app

value.title: Classify endangered bird species with Custom Vision
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cognitive Services Custom Vision to build a machine learning model that identifies the species of a bird in an image, to help with gathering data.

value.title: Use deep learning models to make predictions about specialized data
value.excerpt: Use convolutional neural networks and recurrent neural networks to analyze and predict images and text with TensorFlow and Keras.

images.title: Use deep learning models to make predictions about specialized data

value.title: Describe Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Describe Azure Databricks

value.title: Detect, analyze, and recognize faces
value.excerpt: Detect, analyze, and recognize faces

value.title: Introduction to Anomaly Detector
value.excerpt: Discover the Anomaly Detector service that is part of the Azure Decision services offerings.

value.title: Introduction to Personalizer
value.excerpt: Discover the Personalizer service that is part of the Azure Decision services offerings.

value.title: Build classical machine learning models with supervised learning
value.excerpt: Supervised learning is a form of machine learning where an algorithm learns from examples of data. We progressively paint a picture of how supervised learning automatically generates a model that can make predictions about the real world. We also touch on how these models are tested, and difficulties that can arise when training them.

value.title: Investigate container for use with Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn about Container support in Cognitive Services allowing the use of APIs available in Azure and enable flexibility in where to deploy and host the services with Docker containers.

value.title: Publish and use a Language Understanding app
value.excerpt: Publish and use a Language Understanding app

value.title: Read Text in Images and Documents with the Computer Vision Service
value.excerpt: Azure's Computer Vision service uses advanced algorithms to process images and return information based on the visual features you're interested in. This module teaches you how to use the Azure Computer Vision's OCR API and Read API.

value.title: Read and write data in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Read and write data in Azure Databricks

value.title: Deploy real-time machine learning services with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to register and deploy ML models as real-rim services with the Azure Machine Learning service.

value.title: Secure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to secure Cognitive Services to prevent data loss and privacy violations for user data that may be a part of the solution.

value.title: Set up a mixed reality project for Azure Digital Twins in Unity
value.excerpt: Get step-by-step guidance on how to set up and configure a mixed reality project in Unity for HoloLens 2. Learn about the Azure Digital Twins and SignalR services and common use cases for the Azure platform in Mixed Reality.
